reviewText: I cannot say enough about Art Wolfe...if you have never watched his work...you are in for a treat. I have all of his video...love him, love his work..i have given away his videos to a number of friends.
Art's productions are always tops. I had already seen part of this one and wanted to own it for myself and to share.
Everything I ordered I have watched it already; This is an attempt to pass on my love of good literature to the next generation

Nice piece of art, great team. Beautiful landscaps, places, and for every photo a story behind. In few words, nice videos.

Sergio
Gave this as a gift to someone not familiar with Art Wolfe.  He was thrilled with the photography and narrative.  Great purchase.
It was a birthday gift for a 5 year old.  He was very excited and said it's his all time favorite!
